other_tests.findings: Negative for aggregation with ADP, ristocetin, collagen, and epinephrine at age 8 months.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 15 years of age, repeated thrombocyte aggregation test showed no aggregation with ADP, collagen, or epinephrine, and weak aggregation with ristocetin.

other_tests.findings: Bone age determined to be 4 years, which was 3.8 years retarded relative to chronological age.
Indicated extremely low serum concentrations of IGF-I (215 ng/ml) which remained abnormally low after 4 days of GH treatment.
No immunodetectable STAT5b protein in cell lysates from patientâ€™s fibroblasts; normal levels of STAT5a protein were detected.
